pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.3: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.4: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.5: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.6: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.8: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.11: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.14: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.16: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.19: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.20: ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi. Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro. Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.22: ‘māyye, kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca— buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi. Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro. Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmīti, abhiramāyye, svākkhāto dhammo; cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.23: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.24: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:1.25: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.8: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi …pe… sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi. Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro. Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.12: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.16: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.28: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.39: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.40: ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.42: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.44: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.47: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.50: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.52: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.53: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.57: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.58: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.62: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.1.66: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
